function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of pre-employment and periodic medical check-ups for offshore workers","Impact":"Increased risk of infected workers entering the workplace, leading to potential virus spread","Mitigation":"Implement mandatory pre-employment and periodic medical check-ups for all offshore workers","Technologies":"Medical screening tools and technologies for early detection of COVID-19","People":"Offshore workers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Employers, offshore platform operators"},{"Description":"Incomplete compliance with medical check-up requirements","Impact":"Potential presence of unwell workers in the offshore workplace, increasing the risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Enforce strict compliance with medical check-up requirements and consequences for non-compliance","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems and compliance tracking tools","People":"Human resources, employers, offshore workers","Owner":"Employers, human resources department"},{"Description":"Insufficient adherence to COVID-19 prevention guidelines","Impact":"Higher likelihood of COVID-19 outbreaks in the offshore workplace, posing a risk to worker health and safety","Mitigation":"Regular training, education, and monitoring of COVID-19 prevention guidelines and protocols","Technologies":"COVID-19 tracing and monitoring apps, virtual training platforms","People":"Health and safety officers, offshore workers","Owner":"Health and safety departments, offshore platform operators"}]}
